resources.string:
Ensure vehicle is within 1m and 20 degrees of starting pose. Enable by pressing buttons "First" and "Hold" in order within 2 seconds of each other.

While holding, localization will attempt to find its pose and will give its distance to starting position.

When released, if the AUV is within 0.1m of its starting position, it will hold its position. Otherwise, it will return.
Torpedo will follow a fixed path through a known map
Localization is attempting to find pose.\n\nMove ROV closer to start position.

Move to start pose.

Must be within:
0.1m Translation
5 deg Rotation
